name: ucc-portal
description: Static UCC Student Portal with Cypress E2E tests

scripts.postinstall: bash scripts/build-css.sh || true && npm run link-sass-bin
scripts.link-sass-bin: node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.mkdirSync('./node_modules/.bin',{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync('./node_modules/.bin/sass','#!/usr/bin/env bash\nif command -v npx >/dev/null 2>&1 && npx --yes --quiet sass --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then exec npx sass \"$@\"; fi; bash ./scripts/build-css.sh || true\n');fs.chmodSync('./node_modules/.bin/sass',0o755);"
